TextView.android:text: 1. Word Ending -tion The word ending -tion (sometimes spelled -sion, -cian, or -shion) is represented by ish.
2. Word Endings -cient, -clency The word ending -cient (or -tient) is represented by ish-t; -ciency, by ish-s-e.
3. T for To in Phrases In phrases, to is represented by t when it is followed by.a downstroke.
